text:
@senatemajldr On May 15th the House passed, on a bipartisan vote, The Heroes Act, a bold and comprehensive coronavirus response bill that will meet the challenge this pandemic poses to our nation.
Republican Senators sat on their hands and did nothing and now are blaming the Democrats.
